entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet format does not work in WPF projects in .NET 6 RC 2 #22068
  • PublishReadyToRunComposite and PublishReadyToRunUseCrossgen2 fails #22067
  • .NET SDK Debian 11, Alpine 3.14 and Ubuntu 20.04 has vulnerabilities in ACR Qualys Scan #22056
  • dotnet process exits very slowly on MacOS #22054
  • Fix duplicate AnalysisLevel_*.editorconfig files packaged inside the .NET SDK #22051
  • [Known Issue] Installing VS2022 Preview 5.0 and/or .NET 6.0 RC2 results in x86 dotnet on the PATH #22047
  • Migration to .NET 6 RC-2 from .NET 5 #22053
  • [Breaking change] Stop adding `C:\Program Files(x86)\dotnet` to the path on x64 and Arm64 machines #22030
    7.0.1xx

Closed

  • The SDK info duplicate display after install .NET Core 6.0 RTM/.NET Core 7.0 #22050
  • Update to .NET 6 RC 2, then workloads are not able to GC #21983

PullRequests

Created

  • [Razor] Fix up-to-date check on static web assets #22045
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #22035
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix demand for internal build on Windows #21999
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use NuGetPackageVersion in dotnet.*.js file name #21919
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, 6.0.1xx

Updated

  • Adding `DotNetWatchBuild` variable to the msbuild initiated by dotnet-watch #21722
    Area-Watch
  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on 5.0.4xx #20865
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #22001
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix `dotnet list package` when current directory contains a `#` character in Unix systems #20449
    Area-NuGet
